results.name: Arithmetic derivative of squarefree numbers.
comment: a(n) and A005117(n) are coprime, cf. A085731. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 10 2011
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Victor Ufnarovski and Bo Ahlander, How to Differentiate a Number, J. Integer Seqs., Vol. 6, 2003.
formula: a(n) = Sum(A005117(n)/p: prime p divides A005117(n)).
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 27 2002
